text: Skin Diamond (real name: Raylin Christensen; February 18, 1987) is the an award winning American pornographic actress and nude model. ==Early life== Diamond was born in Ventura, California, and raised in Dunfermline, Scotland, where her parents moved as missionaries.AVN Staff, "The Fresh Issue", AVN, Vol. 27/No. 6, Issue 343, June 2011, pp.40-50. She is of Ethiopian, Danish, Czech, Yugoslav, and German descent.Interview in Sexually Broken, October 1, 2012 Her father is American actor Rodd Christensen. She appeared in the TV series Balamory as a child, alongside her only sister, Heather.Lauren Crooks (November 27, 2011), "Balamory star's daughter blames religious upbringing for porn star career", Daily Record. Retrieved December 25, 2012.Gavin Allen, "What's the story in Balamory?", South Wales Echo. Retrieved December 25, 2012. ==Career== Diamond started her career as a mainstream model and posed, among others, for Louis Vuitton, American Apparel and Atsuko Kudo. She made her pornographic debut in a 2009 Burning Angel film.Skin Diamond at Blogger In that film, she was originally only supposed to perform a girl/girl scene, but, in the end, she shot two boy/girl scenes. ===Appearances=== In 2012, Diamond posed for comic book artist David Mack, who portrayed her as Echo in the Marvel Comics miniseries Daredevil: End of Days. In 2013 she posed for photographer Terry Richardson. In 2014, Diamond was on CNBC's list of "The Dirty Dozen: Porn's Most Popular Stars". Diamond was also cast (with Jenna Haze) in an acting role in the music video for hip-hop artist B.o.B for his song John Doe which features Priscilla Renea. The single is from B.o.B's third album, Underground Luxury. She also appeared in the music video for Cheerleader by Omni in 2012. ==Awards and nominations== List of accolades {| class="collapsible collapsed" style="width:100%;" {| class="collapsible collapsed" style="width:100%;" {| class="collapsible collapsed" style="width:100%;" Awards & nominations Award Won Nominated AVN Awards XRCO Awards XBIZ Awards Urban X Awards Diamond has been nominated for, and won, lots of awards. She also has piercings in her navel, right nostril, and both nipples.Skin Diamond profile, Model Mayhem She is also well known for her distinctive shaved-on-one-side haircut; because of this, she has been featured in the column "Beauty Showdown" in the magazine Cosmopolitan."Beauty Showdown", Cosmopolitan, US Issue, N.6, June 2012, p.102 ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Ventura County, California Category:People from Ventura, California Category:American adult models Category:American movie actors Category:American pornographic actors Category:Models from California Category:People from Dunfermline Category:Bisexual people Category:AVN Award winners
